subject: Soccer
Copa Libertadores (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Fans of the host team Boca Juniors doused opposing players with what appeared to be pepper spray as they emerged for the second half of a Copa Libertadores game in Buenos Aires.
snippet: Fans of the host team Boca Juniors doused opposing players with what appeared to be pepper spray as they emerged for the second half of a Copa Libertadores game in Buenos Aires.
